name: Speed Spell - Pot of Duality
text: When you have 4 or more Speed Counters: Excavate the top 3 cards of your Deck, add 1 of them to your hand, also, after that, shuffle the rest back into your Deck. You can only activate 1 "Speed Spell - Pot of Duality" per turn. You cannot Special Summon during the turn you activate this card.
